episodes.title: Episode 1: Introduction to the Show
episodes.description: Hi everyone. Welcome to another episode of the skip podcast, a podcast dedicated to helping you get forward in your tech career. Today's episode is a little different. It's actually the presentation that I gave last week at a terrific product management summit that Lenny put on Lenny and friend summit was a terrific event.
episodes.transcript: There are 25 people living in the skip podcast basement
